item.title: Forest carbon cheat sheet
item.description: The Forest Carbon Cheat Sheet is a quick reference guide for converting forest carbon measurements and understanding typical carbon values at the tree, stand, and landscape levels. The Cheast Sheet is updated with the most recent values published in the US Environmental Protection Agency Inventory of U.S. Greenhouse Gas Emissions and Sinks: 1990-2018. DOWNLOAD (PDF) DOWNLOAD (JPEG) The Forest Carbon Cheat Sheet. If you have questions or comments on the Cheat Sheet, email Matt.
